title: The Hero and the Demon King are Eternally in True Love - Novel Updates
author: 流云彩袖
description:
–The demon race burned, slaughtered, plundered, and murdered for money.

The demon king nodded: It’s me.

–The demon race is ruthless and cunning, full of evil.

The demon king was satisfied: Correct.

–The demon race is masked with iron fangs, fierce and evil.

The demon king was pleased: True!

–The demon race is ambitious. They raise wicked beasts in captivity and lurk within the country’s capital, gathering information. Their hearts are impure!

The demon king: ……?

–Hero from afar, ah. Please lead the army, drive out the monsters, and help innocent citizens return to their homeland!

The demon king raised his head. He saw a familiar figure make a solemn declaration to the few defeated soldiers lined up, and he felt that life had become just black and white again.

This is a series of stories about a hero who intends to save the princess, but in the end ‘saves’ the demon king by mistake. It’s not a serious western fantasy.

Brave, persevering, upright and kind-hearted classic (but directionally challenged) Hero x Cleanliness-is-more-prosperous-than-beauty shameless Demon King.>
